duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and execute comprehensive sales strategies to increase market share and penetrate new markets with motion control products.
Lead and mentor a team of sales professionals, providing guidance and support to achieve sales targets.
Analyze market potential and prepare annual sales forecasts and district plans as required by Sales management.
Maintain a healthy pipeline of opportunities with a target revenue of $500K, ensuring a 34% win rate and closure within 127 days.
Collaborate with OEM’s, MRO accounts, and Industrial Distributors for sales, specification, and training efforts.
Proactively work with Distribution focusing on training, joint target account efforts, and national corporate programs.
Keep supervisor informed on key activities and actions in the marketplace that may impact the business.
Ensure controlled and effective use of expenses through planning and efficient coverage of District and accounts.
Follow Regal’s Ethics and Safety Programs, State and Federal Environmental Compliance Programs, and Export, Import, and Supply Chain Security Policy requirements.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS Degree, 4 Years of Outside Sales Experience (Industrial Sales Preferred), Mechanical Aptitude
